resources.string: Please enjoy the hard work that went into this app! If you are like me, everyone thinks that you have no sense of fashion due to the habbit of just throwing random stuff on early in the morning. Show them your true sense of style by allowing this app to help you plan ahead!
Choose the articles of clothing you like the most. Your fit will be seen together in the next screen when you are done. If you change your mind you can always click on the image again to re-pick.
Maybe you should put some pants on before you leave the house…
You should probably find a shirt for the day…
When did you get to stylish?
